title: Sponsorship & Banners 2
custom_preconds:
Given that Developer help is provided
And the Developer has setup an Ad Banner for the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: When the developer has setup an Ad Banner for the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then an Ad Banner is seen on the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has setup the unclose-able banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we shouldn't see the banner
And we shouldn't be able to close the banner

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have a Developer has setup the banner
And the banner is hyper-linked to a URL that should be open in an internal webview
And we tap on the banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Safari will NOT launch
And the user will see the webview open in an internal view 
And the user will be able to easily navigate back to the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have a Developer has setup the banner
And the banner is hyper-linked to a URL that should be open in an external webview
And we tap on the banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Safari will launch
And the user will see the webview open in an external view
And the user will have to background the webview to return to the app manually

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has removed the banner
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the banner should be removed from the location it was previously showing at

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we target ads to the feature of Lite
OR we target ads to the feature of At Bat
OR we target ads to the feature of Premium
OR we target ads to the feature of Dish
OR we target ads to the feature of Trial
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN we are able to successfully target specific ads to each of the feature types

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has setup a popup notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we should see the popup notification only once per session
And when the popup notification has been closed we will not see it again

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the dev has created a popup with a button
And we tap on that button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the popup will close

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has created a multi-button popup
And the Developer has linked one of the buttons to a web page
And we click the button linked to an internal web page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the web page opens in an internal view

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has created a multi-button popup
And the Developer has linked one of the buttons to a web page
And we click the button linked to an external web page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the web page opens in an external view

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has created a banner notification
And the Developer has linked the banner to a web page
And we click the banner linked to a web page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the web page opens

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has created a banner notification
And the Developer has used the default displayTime
When the banner appears in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will only show for 5 seconds
And the banner will dismiss
And the banner will not appear again in the same session

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has created a banner notification
And the Developer has used a non-default displayTime (example 30 seconds)
When the banner appears in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will only show for the set displayTime
And the banner will dismiss
And the banner will not appear again in the same session

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has created a banner notification
And the Developer has used set up the notification banner to require user interaction to close
And the Developer has added a close button to the notification banner
When the banner appears in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the banner will show with a close button
And the banner will not dismiss unless the user taps the close button to dismiss the banner
And the banner will not appear again in the same session

title: Sponsorship & Banners 2
custom_preconds:
Given that Developer help is provided
And the Developer has setup an Ad Banner for the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: When the developer has setup an Ad Banner for the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then an Ad Banner is seen on the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has setup the unclose-able banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we shouldn't see the banner
And we shouldn't be able to close the banner

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has added a banner that can be closed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we can see the banner
And if we close the Banner it will not be visible again

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has configured banners of different heights
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we can see the banners of different heights

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have a Developer has setup the banner
And the banner is hyper-linked to a URL that should be open in an internal webview
And we tap on the banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Safari will NOT launch
And the user will see the webview open in an internal view 
And the user will be able to easily navigate back to the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have a Developer has setup the banner
And the banner is hyper-linked to a URL that should be open in an external webview
And we tap on the banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then Safari will launch
And the user will see the webview open in an external view
And the user will have to background the webview to return to the app manually

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have a Developer has setup the banner
And the banner is linked to a video stream
And we tap on the banner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video will launch using the native media player
And the stream will play without issue

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given we have Developer assistance
And the Developer has removed the banner
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the banner should be removed from the location it was previously showing at

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN we navigate to News

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps_separated.content:

Given we have Developer assistance

custom_steps_separated.expected:
